message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $18,000 to start negotiations. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product. Given my budget constraints, I am willing to pay up to $12,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Hi Bob, thanks for your reply. I understand your budget constraints, but $18,000 is my starting point.  Could you meet me halfway at $15,000?

Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget, I am still only able to consider offers up to $12,000. I hope this aligns with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $12,000 is simply too low.  How about we split the difference again and settle at $13,500? This is my final offer.

Hello Alice, I appreciate your final offer of $13,500. While it is closer to my budget, I still need to stick to my maximum of $12,000 to ensure financial stability. I hope you understand and appreciate your efforts in negotiating. Thank you.
